front.title: Forwarding and Control Element Separation (ForCES) OpenFlow Model Library

abstract.t: This document describes the OpenFlow switch in Logical Function Blocks (LFBs) used in the Forwarding and Control Element Separation (ForCES). The LFB classes are defined according to the ForCES Forwading Element (FE) model and ForCES protocol specifications. The library includes the descriptions of the OpenFlow LFBs and the XML definitions.
